Uses of Class
gameview.PlayerGameView

  • Packages that use PlayerGameView 
    Package Description
    gameview.eView
    Provides the classes necessary for the end state: End screen.
    gameview.generalView  
    gameview.gView
    Provides the classes necessary for the game state: Main window with map, figures, ...
    gameview.sView
    Provides the classes necessary for the start state: Main menu, start new game, player configuration.
